dataQualityDimensions.name: Data Class Violations
dataQualityDimensions.description: Values that do not match the data class of their column have been found.

dataQualityDimensions.name: Suspect Values
dataQualityDimensions.description: Values have been found that do not seem to have the same domain as the majority of values in the same column. These values could be potential domain violations.

dataQualityDimensions.name: Missing Values
dataQualityDimensions.description: Null or empty values have been found in columns where missing values are not expected.

dataQualityDimensions.name: Value Range Violations
dataQualityDimensions.description: Out of range values, which are outside the valid range defined for their column, have been found.

dataQualityDimensions.name: Data Type Violations
dataQualityDimensions.description: Values that are not compatible with the selected data type their column have been found.

dataQualityDimensions.name: Inconsistent usage of upper and lower cases.
dataQualityDimensions.description: The usage of upper and lower cases do not seem to be consistent across the values of the same column (ex: Some values use an upper case representation, while some other values use a lower case representation)

dataQualityDimensions.name: Format Violations
dataQualityDimensions.description: Values that have an invalid format have been found.

dataQualityDimensions.name: Suspect Values (Correlation Violations)
dataQualityDimensions.description: Values of a column do not seem to be correct when compared to the values of the other columns in the same record.

dataQualityDimensions.name: Duplicate values
dataQualityDimensions.description: Duplicate values have been found in a column where the values are expected to be unique.

dataQualityDimensions.name: Inconsistent missing value representation
dataQualityDimensions.description: Different representation of the missing values have been found in the same column (ex: null and empty values).
